title: Does YouTube have bias towards certain content creators? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely make it easy for the large of them, who make the most revenue. Have you ever happen to see some particular video pop up every day on suggestions, even that you don’t even watch that type of contend? Well that is Youtube pushing something to get trending. They must knock it off when they see you don’t click at it in the first day, but they keep promoting to you something.
